thread.title: Jeremy McConnell celebrates his birthday with baby son Caben-Albi and ex Stephanie Davis – and reveals it’s the ‘best he’s ever had’
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell celebrates his birthday with baby son Caben-Albi and ex Stephanie Davis – and reveals it’s the ‘best he’s ever had’

author: Rebecca Pocklington
title: Jeremy McConnell celebrates his birthday with baby son Caben-Albi and ex Stephanie Davis – and reveals it’s the ‘best he’s ever had’
text:
The former warring exes looked the picture of happiness as they strolled side-by-side with their little boy in Liverpool, just weeks after their ugly paternity row came to an end. Siobhan Kelly/WENN 4 The former couple looked to be at ease with one another 
The pair were all smiles as they wandered together, even touching each other as they cooed over their son. 
It is the first time the family have been pictured together since Jeremy admitted he was Caben-Albi’s father following months of warring between the pair . Instagram 4 Jeremy can’t wait to celebrate with his baby son 
It comes after Stephanie revealed she is feeling “content” after spending the past few days with her ex and their lad. 
The former couple had been at war with each other for most of 2016 after Stephanie revealed her unexpected pregnancy news, but it appears the former flames have been able to spend a “lovely” few days together ever since Jeremy’s paternity test confirmed he is the child’s father . Fame Flynet Jeremy has remained in Liverpool Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell looking happy with their baby in a park 
New mum Stephanie gave her fans a slight update on Sunday evening as she shared an image which read: "A Sunday well spent brings a week of content." 
Her followers immediately began to speculate whether her happy mood came because she had been spending time with her newborn son and his father. Related stories YUMMY MUMMY Here's the latest you need to know on Steph Davis and her baby boy with Jeremy McConnell HE'S THE DADDY The confirmed father of Caben-Albi is getting to know his son - here's what we know about Jeremy McConnell A NEW CHAPTER Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell could bag £50,000 for reality show to follow their lives with baby SO NICE SHE SHARED IT TWICE Stephanie Davis claims to have had a fresh blow dry - but the video is from December 22 WHAT A CUTIE Stephanie Davis shares picture of Caben-Albi hours after it emerges that she is reunited with Jeremy McConnell 
Just the day before, Jeremy shared his joy and happiness after spending days in Liverpool with Steph and their one-month-old son. 
Jeremy - who met Steph while starring on Celebrity Big Brother in January 2016 - took to Twitter to express his happiness late on Friday night. 
"Had an amazing few days, feeling blessed," the reality star wrote along with a heart emoji. Stephanie Davis reveals Jeremy McConnell didn't contact her in hospital
